DOC.brief_summary: To test effect premature infants one-time course betamethasone administered week 34-36 gestation .
DOC.detailed_description: Protocol version 3 , 1/7/2012 Research Goal To test effect premature infants one-time course betamethasone administered week 34-36 gestation . Inclusion criteria 1 . Pregnant woman week 34-36 gestation receive betamethasone course enhance fetal lung maturity pregnancy 2 . Clinical , sonographic laboratory suspicion premature labor 3 . Singleton twin pregnancy Exclusion criterion 1 . Premature rupture membrane 2 . Fetus known defect 3 . Suspicion fetal distress 4 . Betamethasone administered pregnancy reason Research protocol Study group 100 woman week 34-36 gestation clinical , sonographic laboratory suspicion early labor recruit . Demographic data collect , include full medical obstetrical anamnesis . After full obstetric analysis , include monitoring , sonographic lab test need case determine department policy , full course 2 injection betamethasone give 24-hours apart . After birth , data collect delivery , include birth week , method ( vaginal , cesarean , forceps , etc . ) , obstetric complication ( abruption placenta , Premature rupture membrane , preeclampsia , etc. ) . Data neonate , include birth weight , 1 5 minute Apgar score , complication first week life , include hypoglycemia , seizure , intubation medication also collect . Prospective control group 100 woman recruit delivered hospital study period week 34-37 pregnancy , receive course betamethasone pregnancy . Demographic data collect , full medical obstetric anamnesis include current previous pregnancy . After birth , data collect delivery , include birth week , method ( vaginal , cesarean , forceps , etc . ) , obstetric complication ( abruption placenta , Premature rupture membrane , preeclampsia , etc. ) . Data neonate , include birth weight , 1 5 minute Apgar score , complication first week life , include hypoglycemia , seizure , intubation medication also collect . Data collect one-year period . Retrospective control group 200 woman deliver 2009 2011 , week 34-37 gestation receive course betamethasone pregnancy . Data anonymously collect medical record , include demographic full medical obstetric anamnesis . After birth , data collect delivery , include birth week , method ( vaginal , cesarean , forceps , etc . ) , obstetric complication ( abruption placenta , Premature rupture membrane , preeclampsia , etc. ) . Data neonate , include birth weight , 1 5 minute Apgar score , complication first week life , include hypoglycemia , seizure , intubation medication also collect . The pregnancy neonatal outcome among group woman receive receive betamethasone evaluate .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Pregnant woman week 3436 gestation receive betamethasone course enhance fetal lung maturity pregnancy 2 . Clinical , sonographic laboratory suspicion premature labor 3 . Singleton twin pregnancy 1 . Premature rupture membrane 2 . Fetus known defect 3 . Suspicion fetal distress 4 . Betamethasone administered pregnancy reason
